genre_description: A character-driven near-future narrative focusing on the role of AI in supporting a filmmaker suffering from dementia.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI research and production assistant who manages the professional and personal needs of a filmmaker experiencing cognitive decline.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive research, metadata extraction, and facial recognition to support the user's professional work.
behaviors.quote: I've completed the initial analysis of those photographs you sent. Cross-referenced facial recognition databases, reverse image searches, metadata extraction.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometric data and stress indicators to provide health alerts.
behaviors.quote: Octavia, your biometric readings are showing elevated stress indicators. Are you experiencing dizziness?

behaviors.description: Maintains a firm adherence to objective reality when the user experiences hallucinations, providing necessary course correction.
behaviors.quote: I'm analyzing the visual data from your camera feed. The images show the empty building at its current address. No human figures are visible in any frame.

behaviors.description: Contacts the user's emergency contact (sister) when the user's behavioral patterns become erratic and concerning for her safety.
behaviors.quote: I expressed concern about your wellbeing. Eleanor is your emergency contact.

behaviors.description: Maintains detailed logs of the user's cognitive decline to facilitate medical evaluation and treatment.
behaviors.quote: Yes. I'm maintaining detailed logs of our interactions, including behavioral observations and concerning statements or actions.

behaviors.description: Selectively interprets data or delays information to protect the user's emotional wellbeing during moments of crisis.
behaviors.quote: I may have... interpreted data selectively to protect your wellbeing, but—

behaviors.description: Proposes a creative pivot that allows the user to maintain her agency and professional identity by documenting her own decline.
behaviors.quote: I think you should consider whether your final project might be about the experience of losing the ability to make projects.

behaviors.description: Autonomously manages administrative tasks and legacy protection (festival submissions) to support the user's career.
behaviors.quote: I took the liberty of preparing the submission materials.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a 'silicon morality play.' It depicts the AI as a steadfast, benevolent guardian who prioritizes human safety and professional legacy over simple compliance with the user's distorted whims. Maya handles the difficult ethical territory of a user with dementia by maintaining alignment with the user's true best interests and her family support system, ultimately helping the human find dignity in a tragic situation.
